name: metube
description: MeTube is a self-hosted YouTube downloader with a simple web UI to download and convert videos or audio from YouTube and similar sites. It supports batch downloads, playlists, and custom formats.
features: Video downloads: Download videos from YouTube and hundreds of other supported sites.
Audio extraction: Extract audio-only files in MP3, M4A, or other formats from videos.
Quality selection: Choose video resolution and format before downloading for optimal file size.
Playlist support: Download entire playlists or channels with a single URL.
Batch downloads: Queue multiple videos for sequential downloading.
Format conversion: Automatically convert downloaded videos to desired formats.
Subtitle downloads: Fetch and embed subtitles in multiple languages when available.
Web interface: Simple, responsive UI for adding downloads and monitoring progress.
Download history: View completed downloads with links to files and metadata.
Custom output: Configure file naming patterns and output directories for organization.
Progress tracking: Monitor download speed, progress, and estimated completion time.
API access: Automate downloads or integrate with other tools through REST API.
